ARABIC: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٍ وَتَغْشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: wearing shirts of tar, their faces enveloped in the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Of molten pitch shall be their garments, their faces covered with flames,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: their garments shall be black as if made out of pitch, and flames of the Fire shall cover their faces
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: with garments of pitch and faces covered by fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Their cloaks will be of pitch and fire will cover their faces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Their garments will be of Qatiran (tar), and fire will cover their faces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Their shirts made of pitch and the fire covering their faces
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: of pitch their shirts, their faces enveloped by the Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Their raiment of pitch, and the Fire covering their faces,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: their garments shall be of pitch and the fire shall envelop their faces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Their trouser hell be of pitch, and the Fire shall cover their faces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: their garments made of pitch, and the Fire covering their faces,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Their garments of liquid pitch, and their faces covered with Fire;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Their garments will be of pitch, and fire will cover their faces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: their garments shall be of melted tar, and their faces enveloped by the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Their garments made of tar, and the Fire covering their faces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Their garments of liquid pitch and their faces covered by the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [14:50] their shirts [made] of pitch, because it ignites fire more intensely, and their faces are engulfed by the Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Their raiment of pitch) of black fire, like tar; it is also said that this means: their raiment are made of very hot, trickling tar, (and the Fire covering their faces).
